author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fortis Healthcare Gets Notice From Registrar Of Companies Seeking Certain Documents
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Fortis Healthcare Ltd:
* GOT NOTICE FROM REGISTRAR OF COMPANIES, PUNJAB & CHANDIGARH, SEEKING CERTAIN INFORMATION, DOCUMENTS TO BE SUBMITTED BY MARCH 3
* ‍FINANCIAL IMPLICATION/ COMPENSATION/PENALTY AND QUANTUM OF CLAIMS CANNOT BE ASCERTAINED​ Source text - bit.ly/2CBGKAd Further company coverage:
